text.content:
Off Balance

Normal damage. The target triggers reactions as if it just used a move action. It is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of its next turn.

Bludgeoning

Chipped Bone

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until healed.

Piercing

Hack and Slash

Triple damage. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Shrink Aftereffect

Normal damage. The target is reduced in size as if subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shrink]{Shrink}spell until the end of its next turn. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Shrink]{Spell Effect: Shrink}

Bomb or Spell
